content: 1 double_crochet in w 2 double_crochet in mc x 2 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 2 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc turn r15 chain 2 5 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w x 2 5 double_crochet in mc turn r16 chain 2 4 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 2 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w x 2 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 4 double_crochet in mc turn r17 chain 2 3 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 2 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w x 3 2 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc turn carry remaining w up the side within your chain 2 s and drop at the beginning of each row until you get to r20 or you could cut and start over with w on r20 r18 chain 2 double_crochet in mc across turn r19 chain 2 double_crochet in mc across turn r20 chain 2 8 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 8 double_crochet in mc turn r21 chain 2 9 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc turn r22 chain 2 4 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 2 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc turn r23 chain 2 4 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 8 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 3 double_crochet in mc turn r24 chain 2 13 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w 1 double_crochet in mc 1 double_crochet in w finish off w 3 double_crochet in mc turn r25 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r26 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r27 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn finish off sew in ends part 3 use whatever yarn you would like as this will all be one yarn…or use scraps if you so desire r1 chain 20 turn 20 chains r2 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each chain across turn 19 sts in each row to the end of the clue r3 chain 2 double_crochet in each half_double_crochet across turn r4 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r5 chain 2 double_crochet in each half_double_crochet across turn r6 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r7 chain 2 double_crochet in each half_double_crochet across turn r8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r9 chain 2 double_crochet in each
